title: Java Language server contributions to package.json

items.description: Relative path to a Java language server extension JAR file
Regular expressions for specifying build file

javaBuildTools.description: Information about the cared build files. Will be used when 'java.import.projectSelection' is 'manual'.

displayName.description: The display name of the build file type.

buildFileNames.description: The build file names that supported by the build tool.

javaShortcuts.description: Shortcuts to be listed when clicking server status bar item.

title.description: The title of the quick pick item.

command.description: The command to be executed when the quick pick is selected.

arguments.description: The arguments to be passed to the command.
